page.title: 12CYCLING FOR CHILDREN
page.content: NOWADAYS, CYCLING IS A VERY POPULAR HOBBY WITH CHILDREN AND THERE HAS BEEN A BOOM IN THE BIKES AVAILABLE IN THE SHOPS INCLUDING BOMBERS, TRAX, BMX, GRIFTERS, BOXERS AND RACERS. MOST BOYS WANT A BMX ON WHICH TRICKS OF ALL KINDS CAN BE DONE. THEY CAN BE DANGEROUS AND SO PROTECTIVE GEAR MUST BE WORN TO AVOID INJURY. THE BIKES ARE STRENGTHENED AND THEY CAN COST FROM Â£85 TO Â£9OO. TO SHOW HOW POPULAR THEY ARE WE ASKED THE 98 JUNIORS IN SCHOOL WHICH THEY WOULD LIKE NEW OUT OF THE FOLLOWING WITH THESE REULTS:- PREFER NEW POSSESS NOW SKATEBOARD 1 15 ROLLER SKATES 13 42 BMX BIKE 71 33 TROLLEY O 5 ORDINARY BIKE 13 49 WE THINK THAT BMX BIKES WILL BE A REAL SUCCESS EVEN THOUGH THEY ARE EXPENSIVE
